sentences.en: European music happens to use a scale of eight notes, hence the use of the term octave.
sentences.cn: 欧洲音乐凑巧采用了八音音阶，“八度”一词就由此而来。

sentences.en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentences.cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentences.en: Hence China has promulgated more than 30 relevant laws, statutes and regulations.
sentences.cn: 中国为此颁布的法律 、 法规和规章多达30余项.

sentences.en: Hence she repeated the lines to herself.
sentences.cn: 于是,她默默地念起了台词.

sentences.en: Hence the hen cries whenever it sees a chicken.
sentences.cn: 从此每当那只母鸡看见小鸡时就叫。

sentences.en: Hence the worried way in which he was shaking his head.
sentences.cn: 所以他是想着自己的事情摇头.

sentences.en: Hence, she drew near these things.
sentences.cn: 因此, 她就向这些东西靠近.
这是手工做的,因此很贵.

sentences.en: The cost of transport is a major expense for an industry. Hence factory location is an important consideration.
sentences.cn: 运输成本是企业的一大支出，因此工厂选址是重要的考虑因素。

sentences.en: The gases that may be warming the planet will have their main effect many years hence.
sentences.cn: 可能正导致地球变暖的那些气体，其主要影响将在多年后显现。

sentences.en: The sports meet will be held three days hence.
There is no resilience to the body , hence it could relieve tiredness .
sentences.cn: 对人体无弹力，从而易于减缓疲劳感。

sentences.en: Whatever is hidden is harmful (hence revelation equals security).
sentences.cn: 任何隐藏的东西都是有害的（所以披露就等于安全）。

sentences.en: Years hence I shouldn't be surprised if I have trouble with her.
sentences.cn: 多年以后,如果跟她处得不好,我也不奇怪.

sentences.en: You can customise the behavior of the Asynchronous Server and hence re - brand it by defining your own command set for invoking services.
sentences.cn: 通过定义自己调用服务的命令集,您可以定制自定义异步服务器的行为,通过为调用服务定义自己的命令集从而对它重新标记.

sentences.en: You can customize the behavior of the Asynchronous Server and hence re-brand it by defining your own command set for invoking services.
sentences.cn: 通过定义自己调用服务的命令集，您可以定制自定义异步服务器的行为，通过为调用服务定义自己的命令集从而对它重新标记。

words.tran_cn: 今后；从今以后；自此以后
